# origin

**Instance Property**

The region’s top-left position.

## Declaration

```swift
var origin: AVCaptionPoint { get }
```

## Discussion

The caption’s origin may not provide undefined [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionPoint/x] and [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptionPoint/y] values, which indicates the region doesn’t have positioning information for that dimension.

## Accessing the location

- **AVCaptionPoint**: A structure that defines the origin point for a caption.
